scene.line: You dreamed of being an adult, right?

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: - Finally escaping her?- But then Mom got sick.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: You have no idea how much she needs.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: That's why you leave the front door open.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Maybe she'll wander away for good,

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: But you're angry at her for what she made you do:

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Come on, Ryan, you're a classic mama's boy.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: What better way to protect your mom

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: than to k*ll the guy who's done her wrong?

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: My mom didn't needprotecting from anyone.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: You only know heras this feeble woman

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: and you probably feel bad for her.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: But you didn't see her in her prime...

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: We weren't supposed to talk about it.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: She would b*tch me and Tina out all the time.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: when she was good and drunk and crazy...

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: and get away as soon as possible.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Is that why he had all those locks on his bedroom door?

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: He couldn't sleep if he didn't lock himself in at night.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: That's how scared he was of her.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: And still he stood up for me that night.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Knowing what she could do to him.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Why aren't you at the dance?

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Mom didn't want me to go.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: We had an interesting call tonight.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Well, apparently, you both had dates.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: All right, get your jacket. I'll take you to the dance myself.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: He doesn't want to sit home on a Saturday night with his mother.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Unlike you, who would rather be sneaking around with Judy.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Don't do this in front of Ryan.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: and I'm going to take him over to the dance

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: and when I come back, we can talk about it.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: But I want to go to the dance.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: The both of you teaming up against me?

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: - Ryan, get your jacket now.- Wha... Ryan....

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: I'm not going to talk to you when you're like this, Charlott.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Now I'm going to go upstairs andI'm going to get some dry clothes.

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Judy Enright is cheap Christmas trash!

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: She's a disgrace and you're a disgrace to good church going people!

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: Don't you shut me out! / Mom!

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ I have a tale to tell ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ Sometimes it gets so hard to hide it well ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ I was not ready for the fall ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ Too blind to seethe writing on the wall ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ A man can tell a thousand lies ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ The secret I have learned, 'till then ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ It will burn inside of me ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ The truth is never far behind ♪

scene.speaker: Unknown
scene.line: ♪ Will I ever have the chance again ♪
